T5 Cabinet McKechnie

Those are some tough ones, Jimi. I have been looking for that Stengel for quite a while. A low-grade one will run you close to $10K. I have been looking topay around $5K with no luck for the past couple of years.

[quote name="bcbgcbrcb" post=1160090]Those are some tough ones, Jimi. I have been looking for that Stengel for quite a while. A low-grade one will run you close to $10K. I have been looking topay around $5K with no luck for the past couple of years.[/QUOTE]

Oh, I know it, but it doesn't hurt to send out a flier.  :)  I am using a Stengel B18 Blanket as his RC right now.  I don't have a McKechnie or Carey right now....unless you want to unload those to me....  ;)  I'd take Carey's Helmar, too.  That stamp seems hard to locate, too.
